### Steam power generation setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Boiler (position -11.5, 25.0) with coal as fuel, currently not connected to a water source.
- Offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5) providing water, currently operational but not connected to the boiler.
- Steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5) not connected to the power network.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to smelting timeout
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients and fuel before starting the smelting process. Check the inventory for required items.

### Errors when connecting boiler to water source
- Ensure that the pipe connections are clear and that there are no placement blockages when attempting to connect the boiler to the offshore pump. Check the surrounding area for any obstructing entities.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
